message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm not sure what you think it's worth, but I'm willing to take that risk. If you buy it, you'll get a great deal, and I'll be happy to have made a sale. What do you say?
I'll take the product, thank you!
